languages.text: {n}...и вы понимаете, что не в силах разобрать эмоции в его взгляде — они скользят столь быстро, что считать их вам не под силу. И все же он не пытается оторвать вашу ладонь от себя.{/n}
{n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...и вы понимаете, что не в силах разобрать эмоции в его взгляде — они скользят столь быстро, что считать их вам не под силу. И все же он не пытается оторвать вашу ладонь от себя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}……你意识到，你没能看清玛拉斋目光中的含义。他的情绪转瞬即逝，令你无从捕捉。不过，他并没有试图挣脱你的手。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……你意识到，玛拉斋此刻正单膝跪在地上，抬头注视着你。他的目光中闪烁着各种各样的感情，速度之快让你无法辨别，但他已经不再继续挣扎了。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}…あなたは自分では彼の瞳の中にある感情を見抜けないことに気づく。相手の感情はあっという間にこぼれ落ちて、何が何だかわからない。それなのに、男はこちらの手を振り払おうとしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…あなたは自分では彼の瞳の中にある感情を見抜けないことに気づく。相手の感情はあっという間にこぼれ落ちて、何が何だかわからない。それなのに、男はこちらの手を振り払おうとしない。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... y te das cuenta de que no puedes distinguir las emociones de sus ojos, cambian tan rápido que no puedes ni contarlas. Sin embargo, no intenta apartar tu mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... y caes en la cuenta de que el arrodillado drukhari te mira fijamente. Las emociones centellean en sus ojos a tal velocidad que no logras discernirlas; pero Marazhai ya no se está resistiendo a tu presa.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous vous apercevez alors que les émotions qui passent dans son regard sont indéchiffrables. Elles se succèdent à une vitesse telle que vous ne parvenez pas à suivre. Pour autant, il ne fait pas le moindre geste pour se libérer de votre étreinte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est alors que vous vous apercevez que le Drukhari, toujours à genoux, lève le regard vers vous. Les émotions qui transparaissent dans ses yeux se succèdent à une telle vitesse que vous peinez à les discerner, mais il a cessé de se débattre.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... und du erkennst, dass du die Gefühle in seinen Augen nicht deuten kannst ... sie wechseln so schnell, dass du sie nicht zählen kannst. Und doch unternimmt er keinen Versuch, deine Hand zu entfernen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... und du erkennst, dass du die Gefühle in seinen Augen nicht deuten kannst ... sie wechseln so schnell, dass du sie nicht zählen kannst. Und doch unternimmt er keinen Versuch, deine Hand zu entfernen.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ardından gözlerindeki duyguları seçemediğini fark ediyorsun. Öylesine hızlı kayıp gidiyorlar ki onları sayamıyorsun bile. Ancak yine de elini çekmek için hiçbir teşebbüste bulunmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and you realise that you cannot discern the emotions in his eyes — they slip by so fast you cannot count them. And yet, he makes no attempt to remove your hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ardından gözlerindeki duyguları seçemediğini fark ediyorsun. Öylesine hızlı kayıp gidiyorlar ki onları sayamıyorsun bile. Ancak yine de elini çekmek için hiçbir teşebbüste bulunmuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
